description: User needs access to shared network drive for project collaboration
resolution: Access granted to shared drive after manager approval. User added to appropriate security groups and provided access instructions.

description: Software installation request for Adobe Creative Suite
resolution: Request denied due to budget constraints. Alternative open-source solutions recommended and provided.

description: Password reset for locked account due to multiple failed login attempts
resolution: Password reset completed and user notified. Security training scheduled to prevent future lockouts.

description: VPN access request for remote work during business travel
resolution: Pending manager approval for remote access. Security review required for international travel.

description: Hardware replacement for broken laptop screen
resolution: Laptop replaced with new model from inventory. Old device sent for secure disposal.

description: Email configuration for new employee onboarding
resolution: Email account created and configured. Mobile device setup completed with security policies applied.

description: Security incident report - suspicious email activity
resolution: Phishing attempt identified and blocked. User account scanned for compromise. Security awareness training scheduled.

description: Printer setup for new office location
resolution: Network printer installed and configured. User training provided on secure printing practices.

description: Database access request for analytics team
resolution: Access denied due to data sensitivity. Alternative reporting solution provided with appropriate access levels.
Device enrolled in MDM system. Security policies applied and user trained on compliance requirements.
